授業目的: The purpose of this course is to prepare Japanese students to work successfully in the diverse environments of global companies.
到達目標:
Through this course students will gain an understanding of:
1. key management and leadership principles for success in international business
2. the complexities of managing a business across cultures and countries
3. key differences between Japanese and western companies
4. how to communicate effectively in a western company
授業方法:
対面授業。ただし、新型コロナウイルスの感染状況等により、Zoomによる同時双方向型オ ンライン授業に変更する可能性あり。
The course will include lectures, group discussions and student presentations. Please note final examination reports need to be prepared in English.
